thread.title: St. Bernard grand jury indicts ex-lawyer, jail warden for posses
thread.title_full: St. Bernard grand jury indicts ex-lawyer, jail warden for posses - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: St. Bernard grand jury indicts ex-lawyer, jail warden for posses
text:
ST. BERNARD PARISH, LA (WVUE) - A St. Bernard Parish grand jury on Wednesday indicted former lawyer and jail warden Alan J. Abadie for possession of child pornography.
In September 2013, Abadie pleaded no contest to felony child endangerment in California. He resigned from his law practice in lieu of discipline from the Office of Disciplinary Counsel.
Abadie's indictment in St. Bernard stems from an investigation that began in Los Angeles in 2011.
A recent investigation revealed that Abadie also possessed child pornography in Louisiana for which he was never arrested of charged, according to the St. Bernard District Attorney's Office.
